longest

Get the length of the longest item in an array.

Install with npm

npm i longest --save

Install with bower

bower install longest --save

Usage

var longest = require('longest');
var arr = ['a', 'bb', 'ccc'];
console.log(longest(arr));
//=> ccc

console.log(longest(arr).length);
//=> 3
